review: The device works very well.  The seach/voice feature works perfectly for Amazon only...which is to be expected.  I use it even more than cable.
author: RCA "Richard C. Amo"

review: Was looking for something that would do what my Roku 3 does with a little more gaming aspect to it. It does what I expected with the gaming being a casual but fun experience but as for the TV aspect of it it does have many apps and once you are in an app they seem to work fine and a decent job on the picture and sound but I find the menu system to be very unintutive. I keep thinking I am missing something but have asked several other owners and they say this is just the way it is.  I found the Roku 3 menu layout to be way more intuitive though their idea of gaming is very poor.
author: Max J Yokell

review: I never use it anymore since it is always buffering and I could never get to Netflix.  I just go through Samsung and my Blue-Ray player right to Netflix and have no problems.  Not worth the money or time hooking it up.
